resources.string: Enter any three of four values. The empty field will be calculated.
The field Time will accept time in minutes or in HOUR:MINUTE format. E.g. you can enter a value of 165 as well as 2:45.
The field Fuel at end is optional.
Example 1: You have 100l at start. After the flight you measured 30. The flight took 2h 15m. You can calculate Fuel per hour rate (31.5).
Example 2: You have 100l at start and consuming 25l/h. You can calculate maximum Time of flight (4h).
Example 3: You know that the flight will take about 1h 30m, your fuel consumption is 30l/h and you want to have 40l of fuel at end. You can calculate Fuel at start (85l).
